name: BallRoller
description:
Hello all, this is Terabyte2 for BallRoller this presents my first ever indie game project.

The concept of the game is pretty simple so you have to find ways to challenge yourself in the game, first of all the concept of the game is to roll the ball to the end, but that may seem a little too boring (right?). To make the game fun you have to challenge yourself with different ways to get to the end of the level (the only level there is). One way I have found to challenge myself with is to go all the way to the right of the platform and try to get to the end by staying on the edge of the platform.
